name: part_009
file: tmp_【 #桃鈴ねね誕生日Live2025 】ゲストあり！新衣装お披露目あり！ねねリズムバースデーライブ！【 桃鈴ねね ⧸ hololive 】 [d-Ua7CIU34I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Momosuzu Nene speaks to the audience, explaining she made a mistake and deciding to sing "Ikite Koso" while changing into a new fairy-themed outfit.
Momosuzu Nene performs the song "Ikite Koso".

subtitles.original: ねー！
subtitles.english: Hey!

subtitles.original: でもちょっと、でも間違っちゃったみたいなので、
subtitles.english: But wait, it seems I made a bit of a mistake, so...

subtitles.original: 生きてこそ歌いまーす！
subtitles.english: I'm going to sing "Ikite Koso"!

subtitles.original: そのために、なんだけど、
subtitles.english: And for that reason,

subtitles.original: ちょっと衣装、衣装ちょっと出して、衣装。
subtitles.english: I need to get out the outfit, the outfit.

subtitles.original: 衣装は出るかな？あ、出る出る出る出る。
subtitles.english: Will the outfit come out? Oh, it's coming out.

subtitles.original: ちょっとねねね、生きてこそは森の民のね、お話だからね、ムシキングは。
subtitles.english: You see, "Ikite Koso" is a story about the forest people, like in Mushiking.

subtitles.original: だからねねちょっと森の民になりたくて、
subtitles.english: So Nene wanted to become one of the forest people,

subtitles.original: はい、今！はい、今お願いします！
subtitles.english: Okay, now! Please, do it now!

subtitles.original: キラキラキラキラキラキラ！
subtitles.english: Sparkle sparkle sparkle sparkle sparkle!

subtitles.original: わー、なんだ？あー！
subtitles.english: Wow, what is this? Ah!

subtitles.original: ちょっと何かの変化が見えたー！
subtitles.english: I can see some kind of change!

subtitles.original: この衣装に決定！
subtitles.english: I've decided on this outfit!

subtitles.original: うーん、何だと言うんだ、何だと言うんだー！
subtitles.english: Hmm, what could it be? What could it be!?

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 妖精さん衣装で、聞いてください。生きてこそ！
subtitles.english: In my fairy outfit, please listen to "Ikite Koso"!

subtitles.original: ママ私が生まれた日の
subtitles.english: Mama, on the day I was born,

subtitles.original: 空はどんな色
subtitles.english: what color was the sky?

subtitles.original: パパ私が生まれた日の
subtitles.english: Papa, on the day I was born,

subtitles.original: 気持ちはどうだった
subtitles.english: how did you feel?

subtitles.original: あれから言葉を覚えて
subtitles.english: Since then, I've learned words,

subtitles.original: 私なりの愛も甘え方も
subtitles.english: my own way of loving and seeking affection,

subtitles.original: 体に染み込んだ
subtitles.english: has soaked into my being.

subtitles.original: 生きてこそ 生きてこそ
subtitles.english: Simply by living, simply by living,

subtitles.original: 今ここから始まる
subtitles.english: everything begins from right here, right now.

subtitles.original: 生きてこそ 生きてこそ
subtitles.english: Simply by living, simply by living,

subtitles.original: 広がってまた繋がる
subtitles.english: things spread out and connect once more.

subtitles.original: ママ私を初めて抱く
subtitles.english: Mama, when you held me for the first time,

subtitles.original: 気持ちはどうだった
subtitles.english: how did you feel?

subtitles.original: パパ私が生まれた日は
subtitles.english: Papa, on the day I was born,

subtitles.original: 嬉しかった？
subtitles.english: were you happy?

subtitles.original: あれから奇跡を重ねて
subtitles.english: Since then, miracles have piled up,

subtitles.original: 私なりの愛も出会いも
subtitles.english: my own way of loving and my encounters,

subtitles.original: 育てて行きたい
subtitles.english: are things I want to nurture.

subtitles.original: 生きてこそ 生きてこそ
subtitles.english: Simply by living, simply by living,

subtitles.original: 無限に羽ばたいていく夢
subtitles.english: dreams flap their wings into infinity.

subtitles.original: 生きてこそ 生きてこそ
subtitles.english: Simply by living, simply by living,

subtitles.original: その根は深く太く強く
subtitles.english: those roots grow deep, thick, and strong.

subtitles.original: 生きてこそ 生きてこそ
subtitles.english: Simply by living, simply by living,

subtitles.original: 今ここから始まる
subtitles.english: everything begins from right here, right now.

subtitles.original: 生きてこそ 生きてこそ
subtitles.english: Simply by living, simply by living,

subtitles.original: 広がってまた繋がる
subtitles.english: things spread out and connect once more.

subtitles.original: 生きてこそ 生きてこそ
subtitles.english: Simply by living, simply by living,

subtitles.original: 無限に羽ばたいていく夢
subtitles.english: dreams flap their wings into infinity.

subtitles.original: 生きてこそ 生きてこそ
subtitles.english: Simply by living, simply by living,

subtitles.original: その根は深く太く強く
subtitles.english: those roots grow deep, thick, and strong.

subtitles.original: その根は深く太く強く
subtitles.english: those roots grow deep, thick, and strong.

subtitles.original: 羽ばたいて
subtitles.english: Flap your wings

subtitles.original: 生きてこそ
subtitles.english: Simply by living
